about_the_game:
This game is an action game where you control the "maid gardener" of the stage with a controller.

Hit the "cage" spinning around the "maid gardener" to the flying "insector" to catch.
If you hit the "Insector", you will take damage.
It is important to catch them while avoiding enemies.

Along the way, there will be enemies "shadows" that cannot be caught, and gimmicks that attack with bullets.
Shadows attack with insecticide guns.

When the number of catches is full, the boss "Insector Body" appears.
Attack this with insecticide guns and defeat it to clear it.


You can switch between the two angles at any time during the game.
It is important to use different angles according to the situation.


You can clear the stage by clearing 6 sides.
And every time you clear a stage, you'll get a reward illustration.

Also, if you complete all 6 stages, you can try again with a higher level of difficulty.
To get all the illustrations, you need to complete all three difficulty levels.

Keyboard operation is also possible, but a game controller is highly recommended.

This game is intended for adults.

Please use the trial version to understand the contents of the game.
You can play the first stage.
I made it a little harder for fun.

Please play first.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains nudity and sexual content.
Be careful.

detailed_description:
This game is an action game where you control the "maid gardener" of the stage with a controller.

Hit the "cage" spinning around the "maid gardener" to the flying "insector" to catch.
If you hit the "Insector", you will take damage.
It is important to catch them while avoiding enemies.

Along the way, there will be enemies "shadows" that cannot be caught, and gimmicks that attack with bullets.
Shadows attack with insecticide guns.

When the number of catches is full, the boss "Insector Body" appears.
Attack this with insecticide guns and defeat it to clear it.


You can switch between the two angles at any time during the game.
It is important to use different angles according to the situation.


You can clear the stage by clearing 6 sides.
And every time you clear a stage, you'll get a reward illustration.

Also, if you complete all 6 stages, you can try again with a higher level of difficulty.
To get all the illustrations, you need to complete all three difficulty levels.

Keyboard operation is also possible, but a game controller is highly recommended.

This game is intended for adults.

Please use the trial version to understand the contents of the game.

I made it a little harder for fun.

Please play first.
name: MaidGardener Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit 7(SP1+) / 10 / 11
  • Processor: x86(SSE2) / x64(SSE2) over
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX500series over / resolution 1920x1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit 7(SP1+) / 10 / 11
  • Processor: i3 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX-1050Ti / resolution 1920x1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad required

short_description: This is an action game where you control a gardener's maid and catch the Insectors flying around the stage in a cage. However, you need to be careful when catching them. It is important to avoid attacks and catch them well in cages. If you clear the stage, you can get an illustration (for adults).
